initcondition.formula: isChecked("On Hold") = 'F' AND isChecked("Closed") = 'F' AND isChecked("Done") = 'F' AND isChecked("Ready for Management Review") = 'F' AND isChecked("Completed") = 'F' AND isChecked("Inprocess") = 'F'
isChecked("Inprocess") = 'T' AND isChecked("Done") = 'F' AND isChecked("On Hold") = 'F' AND isChecked("Closed") = 'F' AND isChecked("Quote") = 'F'
isChecked("Closed") = 'F' AND isChecked("Inprocess") = 'T' AND isChecked("Close Quote Request") = 'F' AND isChecked("Quote Management Process") = 'T'
isChecked("Done") = 'F' AND isChecked("On Hold") = 'F' AND isChecked("Inprocess") = 'T' AND isChecked("Closed") = 'F'
isChecked("Ready for Management Review") = 'F' AND isChecked("Done") = 'T' AND isChecked("On Hold") = 'F'
isChecked("Done") = 'T' AND isChecked("Ready for Management Review") = 'T' AND isChecked("Completed") = 'F' AND isChecked("On Hold") = 'F' AND "User" IN ("Employee1","Employee2")
isChecked("Closed") = 'F' AND isChecked("Completed") = 'F' AND isChecked("Done") = 'F' AND isChecked("Ready for Management Review") = 'F'
